meanings.definition: A plant of the mustard family with small white or yellow flowers.
meanings.sent1: The alyssum in the garden has delicate white petals.
meanings.sent2: I planted alyssum in my backyard for its pretty flowers.
meanings.sent3: The alyssum decided to throw a party and invited all the other flowers.
meanings.sent4: The alyssum stood out in the garden like a tiny beacon of light.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the alyssum filled the air with sweetness.

meanings.definition: Alyssum is a genus of about 100–170 species of flowering plants in the family Brassicaceae.
meanings.sent1: The alyssum genus includes many different types of plants.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the diversity of alyssum species in the Brassicaceae family.
meanings.sent3: The alyssum genus held a family reunion with all its plant relatives.
meanings.sent4: The alyssum genus is like a colorful tapestry woven by nature.
meanings.sent5: Each species of alyssum in the Brassicaceae family has its own unique beauty.
